about.title: About Me
about.description: My name is Anastasis, and I am a Full Stack Web Developer with experience in building modern applications using JavaScript, Typescript, React, Java and more.  I enjoy solving problems and learning new technologies.
about.goalsDescription: In the next five years, I aim to grow into a Senior Full Stack Developer, contribute to large projects, and expand expand my expreniece and knowledge into the web development.
about.interviewTitle: What I Enjoyed in the Interview
about.interviewDescription: During the interview, I really enjoyed the discussion overall and the new technologies that the company use.

items.title: LoyalTree App
items.description: Loyaltree is a full-stack, multi-tenant loyalty platform enabling businesses to issue and manage digital rewards via web, mobile, and native apps.

items.title: Security Monitoring AI
items.description: Web application designed to identify unusual patterns in data streams.
